TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: The <color=orange>Inspired's</color> construction was completed today.

CASSAVA: Using a lattice of gravity crystals arranged towards its core, the <color=orange>Inspired</color> will exert a localized gravitational field to capture and compact all deadly matter spread across this star system into itself.

CASSAVA: Upon receiving the order, the central warp core will be crushed - and all comprising gravity crystals will exert maximal output towards the core, crushing inwards against the impenetrable force of the white hole.
CASSAVA: The accumulated pressure will be explosively released - spreading the matter across, and delivering massive destruction to any star system within its blast radius.
CASSAVA: Once I am able to calculate the source of the comet...
CASSAVA: I shall deliver my grief, my fury - to the source of this hostility - a weapon inspired by their own.
